items.name: Lantern
items.description: A small lantern that can light up dark areas.

items.name: Rope
items.description: A sturdy rope that can be used to climb or tie things together.

items.name: Map
items.description: A map of the cave system, showing various paths and locations.

rooms.name: Cave Entrance
rooms.description: You stand at the entrance of a dark cave. The air is damp and the sound of dripping water echoes from within.

rooms.name: Dark Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel is narrow and the walls are slick with moisture. You can hear faint noises deeper inside.

rooms.name: Hidden Chamber
rooms.description: This chamber is dimly lit by glowing crystals embedded in the walls. A treasure chest sits in the corner.

items.name: Treasure Chest
items.description: A sturdy chest that looks like it might contain something valuable.
